our_candidate.name: Emily Schroeder
our_candidate.background: State Senator, former nurse, labor organizer, Appleton native, German-American, working-class roots

opponent.name: Mark Thompson
opponent.background: Business executive, Milwaukee suburbs, moderate positioning, wealthy self-funder, limited political experience

demographics.economic_profile: Manufacturing base, dairy farming, healthcare industry, paper mills declining, growing tech sector in Madison

notes: Narrow open-seat win (+2.8%) required different strategy than 2022 Senate loss. Schroeder's working-class authenticity and nurse background resonated. Healthcare costs message landed. Thompson's business background was mixed liability/asset. WOW counties remained competitive. Madison delivered base turnout. Fox Valley manufacturing anxiety provided opening. Learned lessons from 2022: specific economic message over generic populism.
